# Tallinn Bachata Experience 2025 (4th Edition)

![icon calendar](https://www.goandance.com/build/static/images/icons/events/calendar-check.d3f088df.svg)

From Thursday, November 20 at 18:00 to Monday, November 24 at 3:00

![icon location](https://www.goandance.com/build/static/images/icons/events/location-dot.17ed99a5.svg)

[KultuuriKatel - Tallinn Creative Hub, Kursi tänav, 3, 10415 - Tallinn](https://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query=59.4443706%2C24.7501547)

## Organizer

![Crazy Lion Events](https://goandance-media-cache-prod.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/width_300/organizer/profile/2024/10/04/680677841d7ba870679252.png)

### [Crazy Lion Events](/en/organizer/1922/crazy-lion-events)

![star full](https://www.goandance.com/build/static/images/icons/star.ed947a27.svg)
![star full](https://www.goandance.com/build/static/images/icons/star.ed947a27.svg)
![star full](https://www.goandance.com/build/static/images/icons/star.ed947a27.svg)
![star full](https://www.goandance.com/build/static/images/icons/star.ed947a27.svg)
![star full](https://www.goandance.com/build/static/images/icons/star.ed947a27.svg)

## Description

The 4th edition of the highly successful Tallinn Bachata Experience! Experience one of the most up & coming Bachata communities in the Northern Europe with close connections to both Scandinavia and the Baltics.   
  
What to expect:   
★ Central Venue / 10 hotels within 500m~   
★ Venue is 2000+ sqm   
★ Walking distance from Tallinn Ferry terminal  
★ 50+ International & National Artists + DJ's Of Bachata   
★ +30h Workshops and Party Workshops   
★ Masterclass Bootcamp   
★ Lady Styling Bootcamp   
★ 3 Big parties (Fri-Sun)   
★ Thursday Official Pre-Party   
★ 3 Workshop Days   
★ Jack & Jill Competition   
★ International & National DJs   
★ Special Guest dancers   
★ Event with International Dancers   
▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁   
▶ ARTISTS, DJs & PHOTO/VIDEO ◀   
▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔

✦ International Bachata Artists ✦  
✪ Ofir & Ofri (IL) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Felipe & Tiago (ES/PT)  
✪ Masa & Polina (JP/CY) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Owen & Ewa (NL/PL)  
✪ Tonio (FR) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Sorush & Elise (SE/EE)  
✪ Xi & Alina (DE/BR)  
✪ Victor & Alba (ES) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Elwin & Gaby (ES) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Rezi & Sia (UK/UA) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Iban & Julia (ES/PL) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Soo Kim & Nara (KR) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Imad & Birgit (DK)  
✪ Kevin (LU) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Gadir & Kate (DK/UA) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Liza (UA) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Alex Delgado (ES) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Jeremy (AU) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Hasan (TR) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Pinja (FI)  
✪ Rado (SK)  
✪ Gabija (LT) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Veronika (EE) ★ NEW ★

✦ DJ/MEDIA ✦  
✪ DJ Dimen5ions (UK)  
✪ DJ Pablo G (CH)  
✪ DJ BachataLovesMe (ES)  
✪ DJ Extreme (NO) ★ NEW ★  
✪ DJ Roberto (PR)  
✪ DJ Peter (SE) ★ NEW ★  
✪ DJ Angry (CU)  
✪ Azu Records (LT)  
✪ Lutty Media (ES)  
✪ PPZ Dance TV (FR)  
✪ LDR Media (FR) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Romero Production (SE) ★ NEW ★  
✪ Laurent Prod (FI) ★ NEW ★

▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁   
▶ VENUE & HOTELS   
▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔

✦ OFFICIAL VENUE ✦  
✪ Tallinn Creative Hub / Kultuuri Katel  
✪ ADRESS: Kursi 3, 10415 Tallinn

✦ LOGISTICS ✦  
✪ 900m walking distance from Ferry Terminal  
✪ Parking available outside  
✪ 10~ hotels within 500m walking distance

✦ Main Hotel ✦

✪ Tallink Express Hotel – Single 80€/night  
✪⁠ Tallink Express Hotel – Double 87€/night (44€ pp/night)

We only have 80 available rooms (currently 90% SOLD)  
You can book rooms from Thu 20/11 until Mon 24/11

All Prices incl. breakfast

✰ Only 3 Min walk away from Main Venue / 250 meters

▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁▁   
▶ TRAVEL, TRANSFERS & OTHER ◀   
▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔▔   
✈️️ International Travellers info ✈️️   
Main airport: TLL - Tallinn   
  
For any other questions or inquiries please contact:   
☛ Crazy Lion Events   
☛ Mail: events@crazylion.online   
☛ Organised by: Crazy Lion Events
